statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSConfigurationRecorder) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSConfigurationRecorder) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSConfigDeliveryChannel) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSConfigDeliveryChannel) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSConfigRule) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSConfigRule) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
